entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
